Index >  Addons >  Addon.PDF.SetResolution

Addon.PDF.SetResolution()

Description

Sets the output image resolution of the PDF Rasterizer.

Syntax

.Addon.PDF.SetResolution(resolution)

Parameters

<int> resolution: specifies the resolution of the output images.

Remarks

The default value is 200. We recommend that you set a value smaller than 300, otherwise it might slow down the program.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

Addon.PDF.SetPassword()
Addon.PDF.SetConvertMode()
